amendatorysection.catchline: Public schools; outside organizations; rushing prohibited; violation; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: Any person, whether a pupil of any public school or not, who enters upon the school grounds or any school building for the purpose of rushing or soliciting, while there, any pupil of a public school to join any fraternity, society, or association organized outside of the schools shall be guilty of a misdemeanor and upon conviction thereof shall be fined not less than two dollars nor more than ten dollars.
